concept.title: Properties palette
concept.shortdesc: The Properties palette shows all properties of the specified object. You can change themin this palette. When selecting multiple objects, the Properties palette shows the command properties of the selected objects.

conbody.p: If none of the objects is selected, the Properties palette displays the general properties of the current layer, View properties as well as the UCS information.

By default, double-click an object opens Properties palette if the Properties palette is hidden. This operation is not available when the objects are block, hatch pattern, text, multiline, external reference or gradient fill.
